Title: Skill
Description: A middle-ware for Unity3D, Skill implements useful AI scripts and algorithms to be used in games.
HomeWiki:
Welcome to Skill


Project Description
A middle-ware for Unity3D, Skill implements useful AI scripts and algorithms to be used in games.

download latest source code Here

download latest skill unitypackage and sample Here

Features

  • BehaviorTree
  • AnimationTree
  • AudioController
  • UI controls
  • Editor UI controls
  • SaveGame Serialization
  • Persian text
  • Implant
  • Distance tool
  • Curve Editor
  • Subtitle Editor, Renderer
  • Localization Dictionary Editor
  • Matinee Editor
  • Copy Components tool
  • Move and Duplicate tool
  • Paint Color(texture) on mesh
  • Batch mesh creator
  • 3D Curves
  • Useful scripts like : AnimatorManager, Weapon, Cameras, Health,...
  • ...
